name: Lab Breakout (itch)
description:
You wake in an unknown lab and found your arm has replaced as you try to Escape a communication device receive message from a person informing you about more people alive there but stuck and tells you about lab outbreak. Can you rescue all survivors by lifting the lockdown? But watch out for the monster pursuing you!

Made in 9 days for a game jam all assets msde from scratch with code no templates used.

Sounds from freesounds.
